thread.title_full: The Best - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: BrendanTK
title: The Best
text:
The Kerry Center in Beijing is the best. Amazing gym with incredible facilities, massive pool and tennis and basketball courts. While I am normally on business, they also have an Adventure Zone for the kids. Huge plus for families.
The rooms are modern, well-appointed and the staff are incredibly attentive.
I travel a ton, and so I am so impressed how they all seem to recognize frequent travelers from the Shangri la Golden Circle program. It is unreal how they do it.
Every time I arrive they have always made little adjustments based upon either a specific preference I expressed or even something the maid observed and fed into the system.
Centro is a great bar always with real energy and great music.
The Horizon Club and the team working there are amazing. Highly recommend a stay at a club level room.
